attributes.action: Amelia Maybe Memorial Bench in Black Park
attributes.additional_details:
Amelia passed away from an extreme asthma attack in January 2014 leaving us all heartbroken.
I will spend the rest of my life spreading the word of Woo and all she believed in.

Black park was her favourite place in her home town in Slough. She would spend time there with her family playing, exploring nature and collecting pine cones for the squirrels.

Buckinghamshire Council say they no longer allow new memorial benches at the park. I want them to make an exception for a very special little girl.  It was more than just a park to Amelia it was the foundation for her imagination and stories.

Please sign and spread the word of our Woo!

rejection.details: This is a matter only the council can decide.   You may wish to involve your MP in a campaign.
